name: Dark Soul Hunter
description:
This game is a platform game
Platform games are literally the platform where platforms appear.

A platform can be a rocky hill or a floor of a building.

Users must move between platforms and platforms to avoid enemies and avoid obstacles.

The essential element for this is ' Jump '.

Jumping in the platform game is critical because jumping fails to fall on the platform or crash with obstacles or crashes.

Run, jump and slash your way through a vast world of platforming challenges and embark on an epic adventure!

Enjoy it right now.
